reviews.text: The location of this hotel couldn't be better. Its 2 minutes from Las Ramblas so close to all the major tourist attractions and metro lines. However, its also only 2 minutes from the Eixample and Gracia areas where there's some fantastic shopping and eating to be had, away from the majority of the tourist hustle and bustle. It is on a main road so has the potential to be a little noisy at night but it didn't really bother us.
reviews.title: Perfect Location

reviews.text: The rooms are very clean and well decorated, staff friendly and efficient and continental breakfast sufficient.
reviews.title: super budget hotel

reviews.text: Be warned the rooms can be quite small so if you are used to loads of space and living in the lap of luxury this may not be the hotel for you. However, for the budget traveler who wants a pleasent, central base for their trip this hotel is perfect and it would be difficult to find better for your money.
reviews.title: Pretty Park Pelayo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: It's a 2 star hotel

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights in late September/October. It fitted our criteria of A/C,fridge,non smoking and a safe in the room. We booked it through Expedia in July before we set off on a long trip and it was amongst the most expensive hotels we stayed in. 129.00 Euros room only. And the least value for money. The lobby is tiny, as is the lift. Needless to say so was the room. The bed was so small it can’t even have been a double. It was downright uncomfortable too. There was no night table by the window side, so we pushed the bed against the window wall to be able to move at all. We were falling over our bags as it was. The wardrobe was minute There was only room to hang up 2 jackets, and was really only the entry to the water downpipes. Every time someone upstairs had a shower or used the loo we knew about it.
reviews.title: good value for money

reviews.text: There was a stand at the end of the bed containing T.V. and an espresso machine, with 2 plastic disposable shot cups and 2 sachets of coffee. Minibar underneath no milk provided.
reviews.title: Very clean and excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The 1st day we returned in the middle of the day and were surprised that the coffee and cups were not replaced, neither were the towels. So we asked for, and got them assuming it was just sloppy housekeeping.
reviews.title: Good basic hotel, central location
A surprisingly great, cool hotel for 100 euros
reviews.text: The 2nd day towels replenished but no coffee. When my husband asked for it he was told that they only supply once. When he pointed out that we were paying the same rate every night he was given 2 sachets-we had bought our own milk already. It was just ridiculous the machine would only hold these little sachets; I’ve no idea where one would buy them. We didn’t bother asking for new disposable cups-(they were never replaced) as we had our own basic travelling picnic gear and we felt it just wasn’t worth the hassle! We made sure we asked for-and got coffee our last night, ready for the morning
